text: Foreign Land () is a 1995 Brazilian action movie directed by Walter Salles and Daniela Thomas. It stars Alberto Alexandre, Fernando Alves Pinto, Alexandre Borges, Laura Cardoso, Miguel Guilherme, Zeka Laplaine, Fernanda Torres. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 action movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Salles Category:Movies directed by Daniela Thomas
title: Foreign Land (movie)
